entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
